title: MrMojoRising26
author: MrMojoRising26
created_time: November 12, 2023, 09:24:56 PMLast edit: November 16, 2023, 01:20:23 AM by MrMojoRising26
content: Hello everyone up for auction is 3 lots coin serial numbers 14,15,16 The coins are .999 silver and are 40mm in diameter. The silver blanks weighed 1 troy oz before being lasered... after lasered around 29.2 grams I decided not to deep engrave the reverses in order to preserve as much silver as possible. The coins are funded with 0.0025 BTC 16 coins were made in total of the silver version.SHORT VIDEO OF ONE OF THE COINS: https://imgur.com/Lu9pVxASTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0025 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002 BTCEND TIME: NOVEMBER 15th, 2023, 16:00:00 PDT**PAYMENT DUE 48 HOURS AFTER AUCTION ENDS**PAYMENT ADDRESS: 3Q6xqVmawb3B176vvzkZUdUgxDyst9Z1yZSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.SHIPPING: $10 USD IF YOUR IN THE USA! IF OUTSIDE THE USA I WILL SHIP TO MINERJONES AND HE CAN RESHIP TO YOUR COUNTRY FEES WILL VARY DEPENDING ON LOCATION

comments.author: tldr-hodl

comments.body: Quote from: tldr-hodl on November 12, 2023, 10:17:35 PMLot #3 - 0.0031 BTCBtw. if I may ask - that spelling is intentional? I'm probably missing something What spelling are you referring to? VENI VEDI VECI? it is latin for I came, I saw, I conquered. It is not a mistake I think of it in terms of bitcoin verses fiat
